properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.enabled
properties.description: enable or disable sentinel auto configure.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.eager
properties.description: earlier initialize heart-beat when the spring container starts when the transport dependency is on classpath, the configuration is effective.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.transport.clientIp
properties.description: sentinel client ip connect to dashboard.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.transport.dashboard
properties.description: sentinel dashboard address, won't try to connect dashboard when address is empty.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.filter.order
properties.description: sentinel filter chain order, will be set to FilterRegistrationBean.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.metric.charset
properties.description: charset when sentinel write or search metric file.

properties.name: spring.cloud.sentinel.servlet.blockPage
properties.description: the process page when the flow control is triggered.

properties.name: management.health.sentinel.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable sentinel health check.

properties.name: feign.sentinel.enabled
properties.description: If true, an OpenFeign client will be wrapped with a Sentinel circuit breaker.
